channel.title: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos" - Content to be added from the newest release

item.title: Re: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
item.content:encoded:
All added to the main page. Did separate the Strixhaven backgrounds into a setting-specific category.

Also moved the UA subclasses to the archived UA section.

item.title: Re: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
item.content:encoded:
Here are the magic items:

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:scc

I think that all the player-related content to be added from this book.

item.title: Re: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
item.content:encoded: Would it be best to list the Strixhaven backgrounds in their own setting-specific category? Also, the Strixhaven UA subclasses will have to be moved to Archived UA.

item.title: Re: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
item.content:encoded:
Here's what's been added so far. Magic items will be added soon.

Backgrounds:
Lorehold Student - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:lorehold-student
Prismari Student - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:prismari-student
Quandrix Student - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:quandrix-student
Silverquill Student - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:silverquill-student
Witherbloom Student - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:witherbloom-student

Feats:
Strixhaven Initiate - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:strixhaven-initiate
Strixhaven Mascot - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:strixhaven-mascot

Spells:
Borrowed Knowledge - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:borrowed-knowledge
Kinetic Jaunt - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:kinetic-jaunt
Silvery Barbs - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:silvery-barbs
Vortex Warp - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:vortex-warp
Wither and Bloom - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:wither-and-bloom

item.title: Re: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
item.content:encoded: Owlin added to the front page, along with the feat and background pages that were created.

item.title: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
item.content:encoded:
So I recently got the new Strixhaven book and so I'm going to be creating pages for all the new player-related content and posting the links here.

Owlin Race - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/owlin
